LanguageData.cider.description: A bottle of sweet alcohol made from apples.
LanguageData.rum.label: 朗姆酒
LanguageData.rum.description: A bottle filled with alcoholic rum. Why is the rum gone?
LanguageData.Wine.label: 葡萄酒
LanguageData.Wine.description: A sweet alcohol from grapes. From private Reserves often stolen and smuggled.
LanguageData.strawberrywine.label: 浆果酒
LanguageData.strawberrywine.description: A bottle of sweet, pinkish alcohol made from strawberries.
LanguageData.saki.label: 清酒
LanguageData.saki.description: A bottle of crisp, refreshing alcohol made from rice.
LanguageData.vodka.label: 伏特加
LanguageData.vodka.description: A bottle of clear, potato-based alcohol.
LanguageData.tequila.label: 龙舌兰酒
LanguageData.tequila.description: A potent liquor made of agave. It has a picture of what looks like a naked and inebriated female cat person on the bottle. Once discovered by a certain Orassan, she quickly perfected the recipe and it became a very popular drink on Orassia and developed an even more storied reputation.
LanguageData.whisky.label: 威士忌
LanguageData.whisky.description: A bottle of golden, corn-based alcohol.
